originalTitle: From Hollywood to the homeland: Why African countries are courting black American stars
title: From Hollywood to the homeland: Why African countries are courting black American stars
content: Ciara and Samuel L Jackson are among the big names who have become citizens of African countries in recent years.

originalTitle: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
title: Zambian leader backs traditional Ghanaian outfit after online trolling
content: Some Zambians outraged Ghanaians by describing the outfit worn by their president as a "blouse".

originalTitle: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
title: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
content: Armed jihadists devastate a community that refused to convert to their hard-line interpretation of Islam.

originalTitle: Is Nigeria’s security situation worsening, or is there progress?
title: Is Nigeria’s security situation worsening, or is there progress?
content: More than 200 people have been killed in attacks, but the abducted Christians have been freed.

originalTitle: ‘Non-negotiable’: Iran says missiles off the table in talks with the US
title: ‘Non-negotiable’: Iran says missiles off the table in talks with the US
content: Iran’s Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi says discussions will remain focused on nuclear issue, not missile programme.

originalTitle: Syria and Saudi Arabia sign multibillion-dollar investment deals
title: Syria and Saudi Arabia sign multibillion-dollar investment deals
content: Elaf fund will finance projects with buy-in from Saudi investors committing $2bn for two airports in Aleppo city.

originalTitle: France investigates ex-minister Jack Lang over Epstein links
title: France investigates ex-minister Jack Lang over Epstein links
content: The socialist grandee quits his role at a prestigious institute as he is investigated for the "laundering of tax-fraud proceeds".

originalTitle: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
title: US wants Russia and Ukraine to end war by June, says Zelensky
content: The Ukrainian leader says difficult issues remain, as Russia carries out further strikes on energy facilities.

originalTitle: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
title: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
content: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev was shot several times inside his apartment block on Friday morning.

title: Watch: Match of the Day
content: Kelly Cates presents highlights from eight Premier League games.

originalTitle: Ouattara scores late to give Brentford win over Newcastle
title: Ouattara scores late to give Brentford win over Newcastle
content: Dango Ouattara scores in the 85th minute to give Brentford a 3-2 win over Newcastle United, as the visitors win their first game at St James' Park since 1934.

originalTitle: Palmer scores first-half hat-trick as Chelsea beat Wolves
title: Palmer scores first-half hat-trick as Chelsea beat Wolves
content: Cole Palmer becomes the first player in Premier League history to score three career first-half hat-tricks, as Chelsea see off Wolves 3-1 at Molineux.
